title: Rug

properties.name: description
properties.value: A rug can be built in the Rug space of the Parlour, Bedroom, League hall, Skill Hall, Quest Hall, Chapel, Dungeon, and Portal Nexus in a player-owned house. It requires 13 Construction to build and when built, it gives 60 experience.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Rug
Rug
Icon
Furniture nameRug
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Level13
Experience60 xp
RoomParlour, Bedroom, League hall, Skill Hall, Quest Hall, Chapel, Dungeon, Portal Nexus
HotspotRug space, Stair space
FlatpackableNo
ExamineThe handkerchief of giants!
Advanced data
Object ID6762, 6763, 6764
Icon Item ID8317,25362

A rug can be built in the Rug space of the Parlour, Bedroom, League hall, Skill Hall, Quest Hall, Chapel, Dungeon, and Portal Nexus in a player-owned house. It requires 13 Construction to build and when built, it gives 60 experience.
